articles.title: South Korea qualify for World Cup knockout stage after coming from behind to beat Portugal - CNA
articles.description: South Korea are the third team from the Asian Football Confederation to make it to this year's World Cup knockout stage after coming from a goal down to beat Portugal 2-1.
articles.content:
The second half started with the same frenetic energy as the first 45 minutes, with Son and Ronaldo both coming close.
Ronaldos night ended in the 64th minute as he was replaced by Andre Silva. Minu… [+903 chars]

articles.title: Itchy hand? Man shares 'life hack' on how to stop MRT train, gets reported to police - AsiaOne
articles.description: Missing a train can be terribly frustrating, especially if you're in a hurry. But that doesn't mean you should take matters into your own hands. One man literally did this by sticking his hands in between the MRT platform screen door at what looks like Jurong…

articles.title: Best World Cup already, say Japanese fans as Samurai Blue beat Spain to reach last 16 - The Straits Times
articles.description:
The Asian side had already shocked four-time champions Germany earlier.
 Read more at straitstimes.com.

articles.title: K-drama in Singapore: Stars of Squid Game, Snowdrop and Reply 1988 in town for Disney showcase - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Korean actors Jung Hae-in, Heo Sung-tae, Go Kyung-pyo and Lee Dong-hwi took centrestage at the Disney Content Showcase at Marina Bay Sands for new shows Connect, Big Bet and Call It Love.
articles.content: But the spotlight was on Korea, with some of the actors from upcoming shows gracing the events blue carpet and appearing on stage to share details of what audiences can expect on Disneys streaming se… [+679 chars]
